goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 323 KB)
indicator_name: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
target: Promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and, by 2030, significantly raise industry’s share of employment and gross domestic product, in line with national circumstances, and double its share in least developed countries
graph_title: Manufacturing employment as a proportion of total employment
national_indicator_available: Manufacturing employment as a percentage of total employment
computation_calculations: (Number of people employed in the manufacturing sector / Number of people in employment) * 100
comments_limitations: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
